attributes.additional_details: Ideally if she is able to be towed or transported we would like the UK government to purchase her and return her to the UK. Alternatively petition the city of long beach on or even the US government to protect her.
attributes.background: Save the famous and historic Ocean liner the RMS Queen Mary. Winston Churchill said this ship shortened WW2 by two years. Following her retirement in the 1960s she was sold to the city of Long Beach where she has been allowed to fall into disrepair and requires substantial investment.

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

As you note in your petition, after being retired from service RMS Queen Mary has been sold and is no longer the responsibility of the UK Government or House of Commons.
